Title: BitFlex Framework
Description: A general purpose framework that provides the missing implementation for WinForms controls, additional controls, and enterprise services like authentication and global hooks.

Project Description
A general purpose framework that provides the missing implementation for WinForms controls, additional controls, and enterprise services like authentication and global hooks.

Issue Tracking
Bug tracking will use FaultTrack which is developed by DCOM Productions, the same creators of BitFlex.
